channel.title: Bioinfo Subgroup on AMBDABiDSS-Health Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Bioinfo Subgroup on AMBDABiDSS-Health Documentation

item.title: Phylodynamics
item.description: Collection of scripts used for performing bottom-up phylodynamic analysis. Starts with the data collected from GISAID using Augur format. About The workflow includes subsampling, alignment, quality checking, computation of priors for BEAST analysis, up to visualizing the results. Installation Install miniconda. Afterwards, install the required packages by running the following command. This creates a conda environment called phylodynamics with all the needed packages (Augur, Nextalign, Nextclade). conda env create --file phylodynamicsEnv.
